channel.title: Errors
channel.description:
I just got Moparscape 2 days and it was working just fine...
But now when I start it, the "Running Bot" screen says: [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access i s denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.<init>(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I've already extracted the c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ but it still doesn't work
:confused:

item.title: Errors
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

got to C:\WIDNOWS\ and you should see a folder called .mpr_file_store_32

Delete that and load MoparScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Errors
item.dc:creator: @Sarevoke75 Sarevoke75
item.description:
@Sarevoke75 wrote:

I just got Moparscape 2 days and it was working just fine…

But now when I start it, the “Running Bot” screen says:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access i s denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.<init>(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve already extracted the c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ but it still doesn’t work
